message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $180 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we compromise at $155?
Alice, $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go any higher than $135.  This is a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $142.50?
